sqlMap.select: SELECT Fpkid fpkid, Fmobile_no fmobile_no, Ftmpl_id ftmpl_id, Fblock_stime fblock_stime, Fblock_timespan fblock_timespan FROM sms_db.t_mobile_limit WHERE Fmobile_no=#fmobile_no# AND Ftmpl_id=#ftmpl_id# AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Fblock_stime) + Fblock_timespan < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ORDER BY Fpkid DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT Fpkid fpkid, Fclient_ip fclient_ip, Ftmpl_id ftmpl_id, Fblock_stime fblock_stime, Fblock_timespan fblock_timespan FROM sms_db.t_ip_limit WHERE Fclient_ip=#fclient_ip# AND Ftmpl_id=#ftmpl_id# AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Fblock_stime) + Fblock_timespan < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ORDER BY Fpkid DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT Fmobile_no fmobile_no, Ftmpl_id ftmpl_id, Fverify_code fverify_code, Frela_key frela_key, Frela_info frela_info, Fchk_suc_times fchk_suc_times, Fchk_err_times fchk_err_times, Fclient_ip fclient_ip, Fsend_time fsend_time, Fcheck_time fcheck_time, Fexpired_time fexpired_time, Fstandby1 fstandby1, Fstandby1 fstandby2 FROM sms_db_$db_idx$.t_mvcode_info_$tb_idx$ where Fmobile_no=#fmobile_no# AND Ftmpl_id=#ftmpl_id#
FOR UPDATE
